attributes.action: Ensure that tax and expense concessions to members of parliament are available to all
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Members of Parliament have created a tax and expense regime that gives them privileges not available to other workers who face similar constraints such as having to live away from home for long periods. 

We the undersigned wish the expense and tax concessions available to Members of parliament be made available to all, whether employed or self employed.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
